question: Question_05_(a)
statement:
Suppose $\displaystyle a,b,m$ are integers with
$\displaystyle (a,m) = (b,m) = 1$. Let
$\displaystyle s = \text{ord}_{m}(a)$ and
$\displaystyle t = \text{ord}_{m}(b)$ and suppose that
$\displaystyle (s, t) = 1$ . Then show that
$\displaystyle \text{ord}_{m}(ab) = st$ .
